sentences: Iain Burnside is a Scottish classical pianist and accompanist, and a former presenter on BBC Radio 3.
Burnside is the godfather of Chilcott's son, Hugh, and following her death in 2003 became his legal guardian.

Other vocalists he has worked and recorded with include Laura Claycomb, Matthew Rose, Roderick Williams, with whom he has recorded the complete Finzi baritone songs, and most recently Sarah Connolly, with a release of songs by Korngold.
He also wrote the musical play A Soldier and a Maker on the life of Ivor Gurney, premiered in 2012.
